thread.title: eXp Realty Hires Kimberly Ryan as Executive Director of eXp Realty University

author: cnbc.com
title: eXp Realty Hires Kimberly Ryan as Executive Director of eXp Realty University
text:
BELLINGHAM, Wash., Feb. 27, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- eXp Realty, the largest residential real estate brokerage by geography in North America and a subsidiary of eXp World Holdings (OTCQB:EXPI), today announced that Kimberly Ryan has joined the company as executive director of eXp Realty University. Kimberly has been a leader in the real estate industry for more than 14 years. Most recently, she was a managing broker at a national brokerage. She also is a professional speaker, coach and certified continuing education instructor.
At eXp Realty, Kimberly will build on eXp Realty University’s education and training program to support the company’s rapidly growing agent family. She also will develop coaching, consulting and mentor programs to support eXp Realty agents worldwide.
“Comprehensive real estate education and training is very important to me. At eXp, I am excited for the opportunity to build on the robust education and training programs that eXp offers to all of its agents, no matter at which level they are at in their business,” said Kimberly Ryan, executive director of eXp Realty University.
“We are thrilled to welcome Kimberly to the eXp Realty family. Our goal is to improve agent knowledge while building and enhancing their business skills, with Kimberly in place, we're better equipped to meet this goal by continually improving and expanding our education and training programs,” said eXp Realty President Vikki Bartholomae.
Kimberly serves on the board of directors for the Care Fund, which provides mortgage or rent assistance to Arizona families during a child’s extended health crisis. She also is involved with the Scottsdale branch of 100+ Successful Women Who Care, a philanthropic group of women committed to making an impact in their community.
About eXp Realty
eXp Realty, LLC, a subsidiary of eXp World Holdings, Inc. (OTCQB:EXPI), is the largest residential real estate brokerage by geography in North America. eXp Realty ( exprealty.com ) is changing the way that agents, brokers and consumers work together in an adaptive, sustainable environment. It is an agent-designed and agent-owned company. As the leading, national, cloud-based real estate brokerage, eXp Realty provides 24/7 access to collaborative tools, training and socialization for real estate brokers and agents through its virtual campus environment. It is one of the fastest growing real estate brokerage firms in North America with more than 8,000 agents in 47 U.S. states, the District of Columbia and the provinces of Alberta and Ontario, Canada. As a publicly traded company, eXp World Holdings, Inc. uniquely offers real estate professionals within its ranks opportunities to earn company stock for production and contributions to overall company growth.
For more information, please visit the company’s website at www.eXpRealty.com .
